Misleading report published on a website: with a headline mentioning the addition of Jamaica and 9 other countries to the US Visa Waiver Program.
Verification through SharedCount: an online tool that tracks URL shares and likes on social media, which showed that the false report had been shared more than 2,000 times on Facebook.
Comparison of the misleading website: s name and URL with the official Associated Press website, revealing that the misleading website used a similar but different URL.
Official statement from Malaysia: s foreign affairs ministry, dated May 2, 2019, denying that Malaysia had been added to the US Visa Waiver Program and calling for the immediate halt of the news circulation through various channels.
